definitions.definition: Any member of the genus Glaucus of nudibranchiate mollusks, found in the warmer latitudes, swimming in the open sea, strikingly colored with blue and silvery white.
A desert lime ( Citrus glauca ), a thorny shrub species endemic to semi-arid regions of Australia.

main_definition: Any member of the genus Glaucus of nudibranchiate mollusks, found in the warmer latitudes, swimming in the open sea, strikingly colored with blue and silvery white.
secondary_definitions: A desert lime ( Citrus glauca ), a thorny shrub species endemic to semi-arid regions of Australia.
